quotes.message: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: Our technological powers increase, but the side effects and potential hazards also escalate.
quotes.name: Alvin Toffler

quotes.message: Technology gives us power, but it does not and cannot tell us how to use that power. Thanks to technology, we can instantly communicate across the world, but it still doesn't help us know what to say.
quotes.name: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.message: Technological progress has merely provided us with more efficient means for going backwards.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.message: Technology... is a queer thing. It brings you great gifts with one hand, and it stabs you in the back with the other.
quotes.name: Carrie Snow

quotes.message: Technology is a gift of God. After the gift of life it is perhaps the greatest of God's gifts. It is the mother of civilizations, of arts and of sciences.
quotes.name: Freeman Dyson

quotes.message: Technology is always a two-edged sword. It will bring in many benefits, but also many disasters.
quotes.name: Alan Moore

quotes.message: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled.
quotes.name: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.message: Technology is making gestures precise and brutal, and with them men.
quotes.name: Theodor Adorno

quotes.message: Technological society has succeeded in multiplying the opportunities for pleasure, but it has great difficulty in generating joy.
quotes.name: Pope Paul VI

quotes.message: Technology...the knack of so arranging the world that we don't have to experience it.
quotes.name: Max Frisch

quotes.message: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge.
quotes.name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.message: The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life.
quotes.name: Andrew Brown

quotes.message: You affect the world by what you browse.
quotes.name: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.message: Technology is a word that describes something that doesn't work yet.
quotes.name: Douglas Adams

quotes.message: Technology made large populations possible; large populations now make technology indispensable.
quotes.name: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.message: So much technology, so little talent.
quotes.name: Vernor Vinge

quotes.message: The ultimate promise of technology is to make us master of a world that we command by the push of a button.
quotes.name: Volker Grassmuck

quotes.message: Technology is the campfire around which we tell our stories.
quotes.name: Laurie Anderson

quotes.message: Once a new technology rolls over you, if you're not part of the steamroller, you're part of the road.
quotes.name: Stewart Brand

quotes.message: Technology presumes there's just one right way to do things and there never is.
quotes.name: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.message: If we continue to develop our technology without wisdom or prudence, our servant may prove to be our executioner.
quotes.name: Omar N. Bradley

quotes.message: Technology has to be invented or adopted.
quotes.name: Jared Diamond

quotes.message: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life.
quotes.name: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.message: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
quotes.name: Christian Lous Lange

quotes.message: Technology is anything that wasn't around when you were born.
quotes.name: Alan Kay

quotes.message: Technology will definitely solve all our problems, but in the process it will create brand new ones. But that's O.K. because the most you can expect from life is to get to solve better and better problems.
quotes.name: Scott Adams

quotes.message: Technology is teaching us to be human again.
quotes.name: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.message: Digital technology allows us a much larger scope to tell stories that were pretty much the grounds of the literary media.
quotes.name: George Lucas

quotes.message: As technology continues to increase our possibilities, what we're seeing is a shrinking of the lag time between what we dream about and what we create.
quotes.name: Jason Silva

quotes.message: Technology gives us the facilities that lessen the barriers of time and distance - the telegraph and cable, the telephone, radio, and the rest.
quotes.name: Emily Greene Balch

quotes.message: We can't blame the technology when we make mistakes.
quotes.name: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.message: As information technology restructures the work situation, it abstracts thought from action.
quotes.name: Shoshana Zuboff

quotes.message: Technology is destructive only in the hands of people who do not realize that they are one and the same process as the universe.
quotes.name: Alan W. Watts

quotes.message: Our technology forces us to live mythically.
quotes.name: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.message: As technology advances in complexity and scope, fear becomes more primitive.
quotes.name: Don DeLillo

quotes.message: Technology is dominated by two types of people: those who understand what they do not manage and those who manage what they do not understand.
quotes.name: Archibald Putt

quotes.message: The purpose of technology is not to confuse the brain but to serve the body.
quotes.name: William S. Burroughs

quotes.message: For any new technology there is always controversy and there always some fear associated with it. I think that's just the price of being first sometimes.
quotes.name: Hugh Grant

quotes.message: If it keeps up, man will atrophy all his limbs but the push-button finger.
quotes.name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.message: Technology - with all its promise and potential - has gotten so far beyond human control that its threatening the future of humankind.
quotes.name: Kim J. Vicente

quotes.message: Technology means you can now do amazing things easily; but you couldn't easily do them legally.
quotes.name: Lawrence Lessig

quotes.message: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: New technology is useful, but it's inefficient and ugly; it knows it'll be obsolete by lunchtime tomorrow, so it has no incentive to be anything else.
quotes.name: Tom Holt

quotes.message: Technology makes things faster and more cost-effective, but it's not perfect. It requires you to be as flexible as you can be.
quotes.name: John Phillips

quotes.message: As technology advances, it reverses the characteristics of every situation again and again. The age of automation is going to be the age of do it yourself.
quotes.name: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.message: Technology breeds crime and we are constantly trying to develop technology to stay one step ahead of the person trying to use it negatively.
quotes.name: Frank Abagnale
